title: SQL
content:
Write SQL codes to create a new table named: CPI_study_log, with 4columns of content, first column stores an auto increment log id (log_id),second column stores user id (user_id), the third column stores beginningstudying time stamp (begin_time), the last column stores the end studyingtime stamp (end_time). When create the table, you have to selectcorresponding data type for the variables in the table based on thedescription. 
CREATE TABLE 
CPI_study_log (log_id int(10) NOT NULL, 
user_id int(10) NOT NULL,
 begin_time timestamp, 
end_time timestamp);
